segments.text: Looking at this scene, the kitchen seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's apron and dress make her look like a classic mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sink is overflowing wildly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not hear the water splashing everywhere?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that rickety stool, stretching way up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It could collapse under him any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just standing there, hand out like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet they're giggling inside about their secret.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets, that's going to be a nightmare to fix.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole thing is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is calm, totally unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to yell and stop this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
